Row.Text: They love that you share so much information
They are unhappy they cannot get gossip from you
They are happy to see you in a Golden Age
They are disappointed you are in a Dark Age
They are supportive as you weather a Dark Age
They are envious of your Golden Age
We broke our pledge to move our troops from their borders
We kept our pledge to move our troops from their borders
We decided to not pledge to move our troops from their borders
We joined an emergency against the same person
